You can use the property named userAgentTemplate in the crawler-beans.cxml.=
 It uses the placeholder "@OPERATOR_CONTACT_URL@" that needs a valid URL (s=
o that website admin can reach you), which you set using the operatorContac=
tUrl property. This post might be helpful to you: http://tech.groups.yahoo.=
